name: Tweakers Dark by Hotfrost
description: A dark theme for the Dutch technology news site Tweakers.net. For use with Stylus or Stylish. Want to help making this theme better? Suggest an improvement or make your own version? Feel free to help me out over at the Github repo! or send me an email at flodegri@gmail.com This theme is an updated version of Evoltion's dark theme.
